name: The Airline Project - NEXT GEN | DEV WAVE V. 0.1.1.5
name_original: The Airline Project - NEXT GEN | DEV WAVE V. 0.1.1.5
description:
Home | Website | Facebook | Twitter | Reddit | YouTube | Newsletter

TAP NG V0.1.1.5

Please note, this is a version of the game without a full play cycle. This is mainly meant for the people supporting our Patreon. However, if you want, you can buy access to this early version. In doing so, you add 10 points / € to our Feature Queue.

Please note that your purchase here will not get you any closer to the full release in the future, unlike our patrons. (new versions will be released on new pages, which means you have to buy again)

This is a new release of The Airline Project - Next Gen. (V0.1.1.5) In this version you get to take a look at seatmaps. For this release we will try something new: I will push small incremental updates every 2 - 3 working days.

Thank you everybody for your support, have fun!
